recipe.title: Fresh Chanterelles with Shallots
ingredients: 8 ounces fresh chanterelle mushrooms, quartered if large
instructions: Melt butter with oil in heavy large skillet over medium-high heat. Add mushrooms; sauté until lightly browned, about 6 minutes. Add shallot and garlic; sauté 2 minutes longer. Season to taste with salt and pepper. DO AHEAD Can be made 2 hours ahead. Transfer to baking sheet. Cover loosely with foil and let stand at room temperature. Before serving, rewarm in 400°F oven until heated through, about 5 minutes.
